item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Welcome to my blog! This is my first post using Hugo and PaperMod.

Inline equation: $E = mc^2$

Display equation: $$ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi} $$
